isis.stitle: TRW MANUAL STEERING GEAR - REPAIR - REPLACEMENT OF HOUSING, BUSHING/BEARING, WORM BEARING CUP, EXPANSION PLUG, DRAIN AND FILLER PLUGS

svcproc.title: REPLACEMENT OF HOUSING, BUSHING/BEARING, WORM BEARING CUP, EXPANSION PLUG, DRAIN AND FILLER PLUGS

step1.para: If a rollershaft to bushing clearance exceeds .010 inch (0.25 mm), replace bushing as follows:

step2.para: Press out old bushings with piloted mandrel.
Install new housing bushing with piloted mandrel. Press bushing into bore from outer end of trunnion until outer face of bushing is flush with inner face of seal counterbore.
Size bushing to 1.750 to 1.751 inches (44.45 to 44.48 mm).

step1.para: If the worm bearing cup pressed into the housing shows signs of excessive wear, pitting or brinneling, it can be replaced as follows:

step2.para: Use a suitable size blind hole bearing puller to remove worm bearing cup from housing counterbore.

Press in new worm bearing cup until it is seated in the bottom of its counterbore in the housing. Be sure the housing is square with press base and the worm bearing cup is not cocked during this procedure.

note.para: A new service housing assembly includes the shaft bushing/bearing, worm bearing cup, expansion plug, filler/drain plugs and service dowels as required.
